Posts.Title: Does anyone else dislike the Macmillan Brave the Shave campaign?

Posts.Content: Hi all  I have read the comments and I know I have not had cancer . I am doing h brave the shave this month and now I am not so sure . My reasons were not to shave my head so I "know what it's like" I lost a friend last year to this horrid cancer and now another close friend will start her Chemo on the 12 Sept . my reasons for doing this is she is so so scared and hates the thought of loosing her hair.   I mentioned to her that If I shaved then when we're out maybe just maybe she'll cope with the 'looks she's most worried about "  And if people want to pay at the same time then may be a good thing .?   I was there everyday my friend was ill untill the end and I would never ever want anyone to think I know what it's like only the suffered knows that. I would like your thoughts on this...If I could still run I would do another sponsored run but knee injury won't let me . I just want you all to know that I have no idea what you are all going through and would never do this and think I do ...bless you all you are sooooooo brave xx
